LanguageData.CommandAddDangerZoneDesc: Creates an area outside radiation danger radius.
LanguageData.QuarryAlreadyBuilt: Only one quarry is allowed per map.
LanguageData.QRY_Haul: Automatically haul chunks - affects entire quarry
LanguageData.QRY_NotHaul: Drop and ignore chunks - affects entire quarry
LanguageData.ImpassableDoor: The door can be placed if there is a support structure on both sides, and if nothing block pass through the door.
LanguageData.LookDiscA: We found the location of the ship wreck, perhaps spacer could have survived.
